name: Drako's Delivery Service
description:
This build was created on Wednesday, October 20th, 2021.

  • WASD - Move
  • F - Interact
  • Space/Ctrl - Ascend/Descend
  • Shift - Run (Fly Fast)

Objective: Interact with the Box to pick it up and deliver it to the Red Dragon somewhere in the forest by interacting with him.

This scene is a prototype scene that we may not use in the Final upload of the project.

My team and I are still working on this project.
